item.title: Reflections on the Post Office Horizon Enquiry
item.description: Photo by Cameron Readius from Pexels I can’t pretend I had read Rebecca Thomson’s article “Bankruptcy, prosecution and disrupted livelihoods â€“ postmasters tell their story” in May 2009 in Computer Weekly, but certainly through journalism such as Private Eye I was aware well before the ITV drama screened in 2024. Therefore, I’m most surprised by the evidence presented by Paula Vennells at the Statuary Inquiry on May 22nd. I don’t want to get into an appraisal of her credibility or her competence, other than to wonder how much media coverage you can dismiss and still do your job.
